message:
Can anyone tell me what it is the best Android app development course online for newbies I know a little bit of c/c++. 
Any help would be appreciated :D .

data.message:
Go for udacity's one (developing Android apps )

Try to have a feel of Java before checking this course, just translate your C knowledge in the Java world as this course will not provide you with language training, it focuses more on the environment, framework, planning and designing with Android
You can use C++ for creating Android Apps using a framework called Qt, it's nice and powerful and you can create cross-platform applications ya3ny android w ios w windows w keda
